author: AP
title: Former Olympic swimming champion van der Burgh has virus
description: Former Olympic swimming champion Cameron van der Burgh of South Africa says he has contracted the coronavirus
content:
Former Olympic swimming champion Cameron van der Burgh said he has contracted the coronavirus and added his voice to concerns for athletes’ well-being if the Tokyo Games go ahead as scheduled.
